{{info}}**Task:** You receive the following mail, how do you approach the problem?
> Hello > > I have a problem with the share by mail function. > Some of my partners dont receive mail sent with this function, because their mail solution block mails with not real domain name. > Sender of mail sent by the share function are made with the component : noreply@hostname.domain. > But our domain is an intranet domain, not available on the web, so many mail filter system block this. > > Is their a way to change the send for this function? > Note that the email settings are good on the administration page. {{/info}}
